Hero.title: At Mizan
Hero.subtitle: You can take control of your financial future
Hero.description: We help you understand your financial health with detailed insights and easy-to-use tools.
Hero.emailPlaceholder: Enter your email and join the waiting list.

CTA.title: Take control of your money today!
CTA.subtitle: Download the app now and start investing and managing your money smarter, faster and better - at your fingertips!

features.f1Description: Stay in control with real-time updates on your net worth, assets, and liabilities. Visualize your financial progress with intuitive charts and detailed breakdowns.
features.f2Description: Start new investments directly from the app, whether in stocks, mutual funds, or others.
features.f3Description: Monitor the performance of your investments (such as stocks, funds, and real estate) on a daily or monthly basis.
features.f4Description: Easily set and monitor your budgets for different categories. Get helpful reminders and insights to stay on track.

questions.question: What is Mizan?
questions.answer: Mizan is a personal finance management app that helps you understand your financial health through detailed insights and easy-to-use tools.

questions.question: How do I start using Mizan?
questions.answer: You can start using Mizan by downloading the app from the App Store or Google Play.

questions.question: Can Mizan be used for free?
questions.answer: Yes, Mizan can be used for free. However, there may be premium features available for purchase.

questions.question: Is Mizan secure and reliable?
questions.answer: Yes, Mizan takes the security and privacy of your financial data seriously. We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your information.

questions.question: Can I track my investments with Mizan?
questions.answer: Yes, you can track the performance of your investments, such as stocks, funds, and real estate, using Mizan.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the app's Net Worth feature?
questions.answer: Our Net Worth feature helps you track your overall financial health by calculating the total value of your assets minus your liabilities, giving you a clear picture of your financial standing.

questions.question: Can I link multiple bank accounts?
questions.answer: Yes, you can link multiple bank accounts from different institutions to get a comprehensive view of your finances in one place.

questions.question: How is my data secured?
questions.answer: We use bank-level encryption and security measures to protect your data. Your sensitive information is encrypted and we never store your banking credentials.

questions.question: How do I update my personal details?
questions.answer: You can update your personal details in the Settings section of your profile. Simply navigate to your profile and click on the Edit button.

questions.question: What is two-factor authentication (2FA)?
questions.answer: Two-factor authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. You can enable it in your security settings.

questions.question: Can I set financial goals in the app?
questions.answer: Yes, you can set and track various financial goals like savings targets, debt repayment, or investment objectives through our goal-setting feature.

questions.question: Will the app give me recommendations to save more?
questions.answer: Yes, our app provides personalized recommendations based on your spending patterns and financial habits to help you save more effectively.

questions.question: How do I manage my subscriptions?
questions.answer: You can view and manage all your subscriptions in the Subscriptions section. Here you can track recurring payments and cancel or modify subscriptions.

questions.question: Can I set reminders for subscription renewals?
questions.answer: Yes, you can set up notifications for upcoming subscription renewals to help you stay on top of your recurring payments.

questions.question: How do I contact support if I encounter an issue?
questions.answer: You can reach our support team through the Help Center in the app, or by emailing support@example.com. We typically respond within 24 hours.

questions.question: What do I do if I forget my password?
questions.answer: If you forget your password, click on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page. We'll send you instructions to reset your password to your registered email address.

footer.title: In the Mizan app, you can take control of your financial future. It helps you understand your financial health through detailed insights and easy-to-use tools.
